name: By The Blade
description:
Welcome to "By the Blade", a game about a Samurai and a Brazilian Bandit, known as Cangaceiro.

The Game was made in under 48 hours for the GMTK game Jam, the Theme was "Only One".

What about the Theme?

We applied the Theme in 4 different ways:

  • There's ONLY ONE player
  • There's ONLY ONE enemy
  • You have ONLY ONE life
  • And you use ONLY ONE button (left click) to play
